attributes.action: A minimum of £1000 fine for anyone caught littering our beaches or countryside.
attributes.additional_details: Our planet is being destroyed by selfish and lazy individuals. Littering is far too common in towns and cities. Our beaches and countryside areas are now being ruined by the same issue. Larger fines need to be issued significantly more frequently. People need to be afraid to drop litter.
attributes.background: Strictly enforce large fines and harsh punishments for people who are destroying our planet by littering our beaches and other beautiful parts of our countryside.
